modName: True Sith Eyes for all vanilla races
summary:
This simply replace the textures of the Demon eyes with the Sith eyes, khajiit yellow eye replacer,
and argonian amber eye color.
descriptionHtml:
This simply replace the textures of the Demon eyes with the Sith eyes. from the Star Wars Movies and Games. On the race menu, when you choose your eye color, you will notice it.

NOTE: (OPTIONAL) :To improve this Mod, I recomend to use Magika Sabers Mod, Joo Sith Lightining mod, Higher Jump mod, Martial Arts mod, Extended Slider Colors mod, ( for pale corpse like skin textures),Joo Teleknetic Push, , all these mods are amazing and well made, the credits of these mods are for the own creators.Also  if you want a true pure Sith character, you should try this mod:
Star Wars Mod - Sith Pureblood Race by ZunaSW.
author: Darth Felsus
